verses.verse: Now in the <S%H259>first<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> of <S%H3566>Cyrus<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H6539>Persia<s%>, that the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> by the <S%H6310>mouth<s%> of <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> might be <S%H3615>fulfilled<s%>, the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> stirred <S%H5782>up<s%> the <S%H7307>spirit<s%> of <S%H3566>Cyrus<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H6539>Persia<s%>, that he made a <S%H5674>proclamation<s%> <S%H6963><s%> throughout all his <S%H4438>kingdom<s%>, and put it also in <S%H4385>writing<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, made: Heb. caused a voice to pass

Thus <S%H559>saith<s%> <S%H3566>Cyrus<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H6539>Persia<s%>, The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H8064>heaven<s%> hath <S%H5414>given<s%> me all the <S%H4467>kingdoms<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%>; and he hath <S%H6485>charged<s%> me to <S%H1129>build<s%> him an <S%H1004>house<s%> at <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>, which is in <S%H3063>Judah<s%>.

Who is there among you of all his <S%H5971>people<s%>? his <S%H430>God<s%> be with him, and let him go <S%H5927>up<s%> to <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>, which is in <S%H3063>Judah<s%>, and <S%H1129>build<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, (he is the <S%H430>God<s%>,) which is in <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>.

And whosoever <S%H7604>remaineth<s%> in any <S%H4725>place<s%> where he <S%H1481>sojourneth<s%>, let the <S%H582>men<s%> of his <S%H4725>place<s%> <S%H5375>help<s%> him with <S%H3701>silver<s%>, and with <S%H2091>gold<s%>, and with <S%H7399>goods<s%>, and with <S%H929>beasts<s%>, beside the freewill <S%H5071>offering<s%> for the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> that is in <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>. help: Heb. lift him up

Then rose <S%H6965>up<s%> the <S%H7218>chief<s%> of the <S%H1>fathers<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> and <S%H1144>Benjamin<s%>, and the <S%H3548>priests<s%>, and the <S%H3881>Levites<s%>, with all them whose <S%H7307>spirit<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> had <S%H5782>raised<s%>, to go <S%H5927>up<s%> to <S%H1129>build<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> which is in <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>.

And all they that were <S%H5439>about<s%> them <S%H2388>strengthened<s%> their <S%H3027>hands<s%> with <S%H3627>vessels<s%> of <S%H3701>silver<s%>, with <S%H2091>gold<s%>, with <S%H7399>goods<s%>, and with <S%H929>beasts<s%>, and with precious <S%H4030>things<s%>, beside all that was willingly <S%H5068>offered<s%>. strengthened: that is, helped them

Also <S%H3566>Cyrus<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> brought <S%H3318>forth<s%> the <S%H3627>vessels<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, which <S%H5019>Nebuchadnezzar<s%> had brought <S%H3318>forth<s%> out of <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>, and had <S%H5414>put<s%> them in the <S%H1004>house<s%> of his <S%H430>gods<s%>;

Even those did <S%H3566>Cyrus<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H6539>Persia<s%> bring <S%H3318>forth<s%> by the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H4990>Mithredath<s%> the <S%H1489>treasurer<s%>, and <S%H5608>numbered<s%> them unto <S%H8339>Sheshbazzar<s%>, the <S%H5387>prince<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%>.

And this is the <S%H4557>number<s%> of them: <S%H7970>thirty<s%> <S%H105>chargers<s%> of <S%H2091>gold<s%>, a <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H105>chargers<s%> of <S%H3701>silver<s%>, <S%H8672>nine<s%> and <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H4252>knives<s%>,

<S%H7970>Thirty<s%> <S%H3713>basons<s%> of <S%H2091>gold<s%>, <S%H3701>silver<s%> <S%H3713>basons<s%> of a <S%H4932>second<s%> sort <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and <S%H6235>ten<s%>, and <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H3627>vessels<s%> a <S%H505>thousand<s%>.

All the <S%H3627>vessels<s%> of <S%H2091>gold<s%> and of <S%H3701>silver<s%> were <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> and <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%>. All these did <S%H8339>Sheshbazzar<s%> bring <S%H5927>up<s%> with them of the <S%H1473>captivity<s%> that were brought <S%H5927>up<s%> from <S%H894>Babylon<s%> unto <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>. the captivity: Heb. the transportation
